title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 3793/85 of 20 December 1985 amending, on account of the accession of Spain, Regulation (EEC) No 2727/75 on the common organization of the market in cereals
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) N° 3793/85
of 20 December 1985
amending, on account of the  accession of Spain, Regulation (EEC) N° 2727/75 on the common organization of the market in  cereals
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty of Accession of Spain and Portugal, and in particular Article 396  thereof,
Having regard to the proposal from the Commission,
Whereas Regulation (EEC) N° 2727/75 (1), as last amended by the Act of Accession, provides, in the  case of Greece and Italy, for the possibility of introducing special measures in July to support  the development of the market in common wheat of breadmaking quality in relation to the reference  price for the next marketing year; whereas this possibility should be extended to Spain;
Whereas, pursuant to Article 2 (3) of the Treaty of Accession of Spain and Portugal, the  institutions of the Communitymay adopt, before accession, the measures referred to in Article 396  of the Act of Accession.
main_body: In the second subparagraph of Article 8  (2) of Regulation (EEC) N° 2727/75, the words 'in Spain' are inserted before the words 'in  Greece'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 March 1986 subject to the entry into force  of the Treaty of Accession of Spain and Portugal.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1985.
For the Council
The President
R. STEICHEN
(1) OJ N° L 281, 1. 11. 1975, p.  1.
